content: of the sole of the foot 16 row over the first half of the round work the instep pattern as follows size 64 k1 p2 k2 x 7 p2 k1 size 68 k2 p2 k2 x 8 size 72 k1 p1 k1 p2 k2 x 7 p2 k1 p1 k1 all sizes knit the sole stitches conjoined sock twins v6 0 ©2025 katherine richmond rinaradish 4 of 12 gusset set up stop 1 stitch before the end of the round when the foot length has been reached move bor here work a 1 over 1 cable with the last stitch of the sole crossing behind/under the first one of the instep if desired add a stitch marker after the cable to separate the instep stitches from the gusset work pattern over instep stopping 1 stitch before the end of the instep move the mor marker to here work a 1 over 1 cable with the last instep stitch crossing in front/over the first sole stitch moving the first sole stitch to be with the instep stitches if desired add a stitch marker after the cable to separate the gusset stitches from the sole stitches knit sole stitches gusset continuing to work the instep and sole as set work the gusset increases a follows or use gusset chart on page 9 the first and last stitches of the gusset are knit referred to as the gusset border stitches the increases are worked on the instep side of each gusset they are worked as a yarn over on one round and then twisted to close the hole on the second the gusset ends up as 1x1 ribbing gusset instructions round 1 increase k1 yo k1 work instep k1 yo k1 work sole round 2 k1 pyort k1 work instep k1 pyot k1 work sole round 3 increase k1 p1 yo k1 work instep k1 yo p1 k1 work sole round 4 k1 p1 kyort k1 work instep k1 kyot p1 k1 work sole round 5 increase k1 p1 k1 yo k1 work instep k1 yo k1 p1 k1 work sole round 6 k1 p1 k1 pyort k1 work instep k1 pyot k1 p1 k1 work sole round 7 increase k1 p1 k1 p1 yo k1 work instep k1 yo p1 k1 p1 k1 work sole round 8 k1 p1 k1 p1 kyort k1 work instep k1 kyot p1 k1 p1 k1 work sole rounds 5-8 set the pattern the gusset border stitches remain knit the increased gusset stitches are worked in a k1 p1 rib incorporating the new yarn overs as twisted stitches to keep the ribbing as set continue in pattern until there are 16 17 18 new gusset stitches between the knit gusset border stitches 96 102 108 stitches total stopping at the end of the round indicated on the chart final round of gusset is an increase round do not work the corresponding closing yos round heel turn the heel turn is worked using german short row see tutorials
